tool_description: An API showing current climate news from worldwide sites by EPL
name: Climate News Live
title: Climate News Live

api_list.name: Climate news from specific news sites
api_list.description: Enter the news source and see news from just that source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news/nytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Climate news from world wide sources
api_list.description: This is a current list of news reports from around the world
